jokes.set: After a minor quarrel, which was resolved. The husband entered the room and noticed his wife was lost in thoughts.
jokes.first: Honey, you look bothered. What troubles you?
jokes.second: Nothing really, I was just thinking of what marriage means to you.
jokes.third: Oh, really? Well I think marriage is a relationship in which one person is always right, and the other is a husband.

jokes.set: Before going to sleep, the husband decided it would be a good idea to pose a question that bothered him.
jokes.first: Honey, will you marry after I die?
jokes.second:
No, I will live with my sister.
Will you marry after I die?
jokes.third: No, I will also live with your sister.

jokes.fourth: Lier, you know chocolate can't speak.

jokes.first: Honey, on my way back from work, I saw two women talking about their husband.
jokes.third: The first woman says, "My husband is an angel." The second woman says, "You’re lucky! Mine’s still alive."

jokes.set: Following a heated telephone conversation between the wife and her best friend.
jokes.first: Honey, why were you quarrelling with your best friend on the phone.
jokes.second: She told me that her husband cooks for her every evening because she is a goddess.
jokes.third: So, what was the quarrel about.
jokes.fourth: Nothing big, I only said, "I wonder the burnt offerings he must be serving you every evening."

jokes.set: After a minor quarrel, which was resolved. The husband entered the room and noticed his wife was lost in thoughts.
jokes.first: Honey, you look troubled, what bothers you?
jokes.second: Nothing serious, I was just thinking of how the word WIFE was coined
jokes.third: That's simple, they took the first two and the last two letters of WIDE-LIFE

jokes.set: A month before the wedding. How the husband proposed to his wife.
jokes.first: Honey, My birthday is coming up, what do you have for me?
jokes.second: What should you give a man who has everything?
jokes.third: A wife. She will tell him how everything works.

jokes.set: Husband trying to impress his wife.
jokes.first: Honey, you look sad, what can I do for you?
jokes.second: Thank God, you noticed. Tell, me a joke.
jokes.third: Ok. My girlfriend accused me of cheating. I told her she was starting to sound like my wife.

jokes.first:
Darling, do you know you are 'ABCDEFGHIJK
Adorable (A), beautiful (B), cute (C), delightful (D), elegant (E), fashionable (F), gorgeous (G), and hot (H).'?
jokes.second: Aw, thank you! But what about IJK?

jokes.set: After returning from a hospital checkup.
jokes.first: Darling, at the hospital today, the doctor said he asked you a question, but he didn't understand your response.
jokes.second: Yes, that's true, he asked if I sometimes engage in dangerous sport and I said yes.
jokes.fourth: I told him, "Sometimes I talk back at my wife."

jokes.first: Honey, I observed that you've stop opening our car door for me, what happened?
jokes.fourth: If a man opens the car door for his wife, you can be sure of one thing: either the car or the wife is new.

jokes.first: Sweet-Heart, the start of this party was awesome, but right now I'm getting bored.
jokes.second: Yes, that's true. It's late, can we leave for home now?
jokes.third: No.., not yet. Please, do something to help my mode.
jokes.fourth: Sure, I'll tell you a joke. You know, at every party, there are two kinds of people: Those who want to go home and those who don’t. The trouble is, they are usually married to each other.

jokes.set: The husband spent ten(10) minutes watching a football match. The wife, who had been looking for the remote, finally found it with her husband.
jokes.first: Honey, I don't want to watch football, please can you change the channel?
jokes.third: I have been looking for that remote. Why do husbands love remote controls?
jokes.fourth: Hmm... Well at home, that's the only thing they can control!

jokes.set: After a minor quarrel, which was resolved. The wife entered the room and noticed her husband sad countenance.
jokes.first: Honey, you look trouble, what's wrong?
jokes.second: Nothing really, I'm just curious to know why we always compromise
jokes.third: I don't understand, what do you mean?
jokes.fourth: Whenever we argue, once I admit to be wrong, you agree, and that's the end.

jokes.set: The wife invites her husband to the kitchen for the first time for assistance.
jokes.first: Honey, why are you bringing a magnifying glass to the kitchen?
jokes.second: It's because, I came to assist you.
jokes.third: Is that what you need a magnifying glass for?
jokes.fourth: Yes, I want to make sure your instructions are crystal clear.

jokes.set: A year after the wedding, they both decide to exchange gifts for their anniversary.
jokes.first: Honey, today is our anniversary, what do you have for me
jokes.second: Here it is. I bought you a GPS device.
jokes.fourth: Simple, I don't want to hear you say, "I don't know where this marriage is taking us to."

jokes.set: The wife's first birthday after marriage.
jokes.first: Honey, what do you have for me as birthday gift?
jokes.second: Here it is. I bought you a map.
jokes.fourth: Because, I don't want to ever get lost in your eyes.

jokes.first: Honey, why did you bring a fishing rod to our picnic?
jokes.second: Do you have a problem with that?
jokes.third: Yes, we were not visiting a river or lake.
jokes.fourth: I know, I wanted to catch your attention.

jokes.set: Husband returned late from work in the evening after leaving the house in a hurry and forgetting to drop money for food.
